               java.lang.InterruptedException
        A constructor for a Spanish bot.
        Parameters:
        answerCategories - all possible categories for user input and the bot's response
        model - the pre-trained model of the chatbot
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if input or output exception occurs

      • runBot

        public void runBot()
            throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                   java.io.IOException,
                   java.lang.InterruptedException
        Runs the language bot by starting a conversation and responding appropriately to the user.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if file is not found
        java.io.IOException - if an input or output exception occurs
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the timer that counts seconds until the program quits is interrupted

      • getResponse

        public static java.lang.String getResponse​(java.lang.String s,
                                           opennlp.tools.doccat.DoccatModel model)
                                    throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                           java.io.IOException
        Tokenizes a user inputted-sentence, analyzes the parts of speech, finds the lemma for each token, and detects the category of the user's input. Finds an appropriate response based on the category.
        Parameters:
        s - one sentence that the user inputted
        model - the machine learning model being used
        Returns:
        an appropriate response to the user
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if file is not found
        java.io.IOException - if input or output exception occured

        Parameters:

      • detectPOSTags

        public static java.lang.String[] detectPOSTags​(java.lang.String[] tokens)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Detects the parts of speech (noun, adjective, etc.) of each token using a Spanish POS model.
        Parameters:
        tokens - the String array of tokens that make up a sentence
        Returns:
        the tokens categorized as parts of speech
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if input or output exception occurs

      • lemmatizeTokens

        public static java.lang.String[] lemmatizeTokens​(java.lang.String[] tokens,
                                                 java.lang.String[] posTags)
                                          throws opennlp.tools.util.InvalidFormatException,
                                                 java.io.IOException
        Finds the lemma of each token. For example, the lemma of "broken" and "broke" in English is "break".
        Parameters:
        tokens - the array of tokens in the sentence
        posTags - the array of parts of speech for each token in the sentence
        Returns:
        an array of lemmatized tokens
        Throws:
        opennlp.tools.util.InvalidFormatException - if format is invalid
        java.io.IOException - if input or output exception occurs
